job_tasks.phrase: You will drive the migration/handover of the platform from a third party development company.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes a core software engineering task related to managing and transitioning a software platform, which aligns with the definition of developing and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: You will be responsible for maintaining and further developing the previously mentioned model delivery platform.
job_tasks.justification: Maintaining and developing a platform is a fundamental software engineering responsibility, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: You will work closely with the machine learning team to add new machine learning driven features to the platform.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of ML-driven features into an existing platform, which is a key aspect of software development and integration in an AI context.

soft_skills.phrase: You will help grow and shape the platform team based on real time business needs and client feedback.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of business needs and client feedback to guide team growth and platform development, aligning with business understanding and strategy.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on software development and platform maintenance ('drive the migration/handover', 'maintaining and further developing', 'add new machine learning driven features'). While it mentions working with a machine learning team and adding ML-driven features, the core responsibilities are centered around the platform itself, rather than the development or specialization of the ML models. There are no specific GenAI or traditional ML tasks mentioned, only the integration of ML-driven features. Therefore, it fits the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software engineering responsibilities related to platform development and integration of ML features. However, it lacks specific details about the nature of the ML features or the technologies involved, which prevents a perfect score. The role is clearly software-focused with an AI component.
